/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the depth and perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the buildings and the sky.
